channel.title: CVE Feed for Joomla! Project -- Joomla! CMS
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Joomla! Project -- Joomla! CMS

item.title: CVE-2024-21729|2024-07-15T04:34:00.698Z -- joomla%21%20project -- joomla%21%20cms
item.description: Inadequate input validation leads to XSS vulnerabilities in the accessiblemedia field.

item.title: CVE-2024-21726|2024-07-15T04:33:51.118Z -- joomla%21%20project -- joomla%21%20cms
item.description: Inadequate content filtering leads to XSS vulnerabilities in various components.

item.title: CVE-2024-21722|2024-07-15T04:33:49.057Z -- joomla%21%20project -- joomla%21%20cms
item.description: The MFA management features did not properly terminate existing user sessions when a user's MFA methods have been modified.
